generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A beautiful and humorous birthday card front, watercolor painting style. A funny scene featuring two young people, Jordan and their partner, attempting to bake a birthday cake for their Lao Lao. The kitchen is in a state of chaos, with flour dust everywhere and icing splattered on their faces and clothes, but they are laughing joyfully.

In the center, a 20-25 year old East Asian woman with long, straight black hair and thin-rimmed glasses, wearing a light blue crewneck sweatshirt with 'ROCKY MOUNTAIN' logo, holds a mixing bowl, smiling warmly. Standing behind her, a 20-25 year old Southeast Asian man with short, textured black hair, wearing a tan hoodie and maroon sweatpants, has his arms around her, smiling broadly as he helps stir the batter, accidentally flicking some onto her nose.

The words "Happy Birthday" are written in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script in the safe center area of the composition.

The artwork is a flat 2D illustration in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brushstrokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. The overall tone is lighthearted and full of love. --ar 5:7 --style raw --s 150 --v 6.0 --seed 2783

- Reference photos provided for character creation
- Characters should only appear on the front cover
- Transform real people into artistic cartoon/illustrated versions matching the style
- Maintain recognizable features while adapting to the artistic style
generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and elegant back cover for a greeting card. A simple, artistic logo featuring a small, stylized mountain range and a mixing spoon crossed, located in the top center. The logo is rendered in a soft tan and light blue color palette. The entire background is a light, off-white watercolor texture with subtle, organic paint bleeds, consistent with a soft flowing watercolor style. The bottom right corner is clear of any design elements. --ar 5:7 --style raw --s 100 --v 6.0
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A beautiful, decorative background for the left interior of a greeting card. A full-bleed watercolor painting of abstract, soft-focus splotches and gentle swirls of light blue, tan, and maroon, blending together seamlessly. The artwork has visible artistic brushstrokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds, creating a dreamy and artistic atmosphere. The composition is subtle and does not distract, serving as a complementary backdrop. --ar 5:7 --style raw --s 150 --v 6.0
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A clean and elegant design for the right interior of a greeting card, focusing on message legibility. The background is a very pale, off-white watercolor paper texture. A minimalist decorative border along the top and bottom edges features a delicate wash of soft light blue and tan watercolor paint, with subtle, organic paint bleeds. The central area, where the text will be placed, is mostly clear to ensure readability. --ar 5:7 --style raw --s 100 --v 6.0
